alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Ft; Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 25 at 10:47PM MST until December 27 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM SUNDAY TO 5 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and widespread blowing and drifting snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 15 inches. Winds gusting as high as 75 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Sawatch Mountains Above 11000 Feet and Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Feet. * WHEN...From 2 AM Sunday to 5 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Ft; Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft
